description: Employees from Instacart, Doordash, and Postmates rallied outside of company headquarters to protest low wages. Doordash is rolling out a new pay model at the end of September which, it claims, will offer better pay for shoppers.
author: nataliyaned
addresses: UserTesting, 690, 5th Street, South of Market, San Francisco, San Francisco City and County, California, 94017, United States
Doordash HQ, Market Street, Union Square, San Francisco, San Francisco City and County, California, 94103-3124, United States
